#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long int
#define s(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define p(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define loop(n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define loop1(n) for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
#define M 10000000007

int main()
{
 ll t,n;
 s(t);

 while(t--)
 {
   s(n);
   ll a[n],k=0,i=1;

   loop1(n)
   {
     s(a[i]);
   }


   i=1;

   loop1(n)
   {
     k=k+(a[i]/i);
   }

   if(k%2==0)
   printf("BOB\n");
   else
   printf("ALICE\n");


 }

 return 0;
}
